faq.subtitle: FAQ
faq.q1: Will this program really help me with migraines?
faq.a1: The program was created by a migraine sufferer in collaboration with a clinical dietitian. If you don't feel improvement, you're entitled to a 100% satisfaction guarantee – you'll receive your full investment back.
faq.q2: What does it mean that I can keep the glasses if I don't see a difference?
faq.a2: If after applying the program you don't notice improvement, you can keep the Fovea Blue glasses as a gift, and we'll refund the full amount for the program.
faq.q3: What modules are specifically covered in the program?
faq.a3: The program includes 7 modules: Introduction and organization, Gut Microbiome, Healthy Tissues, Diet, Health Guide, Physical Activity, and Fovea Light and MDT.
faq.q4: Is this the same as the Lwa diet?
faq.a4: No, this is not the Iwa diet. Our program is a comprehensive approach covering diet, nervous system, and light, created specifically for people with migraines.
faq.q5: What do I get in terms of support and tools?
faq.a5: You get access to a private support group, 3x group sessions with an educator, 6-week meal plans, a trainer journal, and Fovea Blue glasses with PhotoChrom.
faq.q6: How long does the entire program last and how much does it cost?
faq.a6: The program lasts 6 weeks. The regular price is 1,699 zł, but as part of the founders edition we offer a price of 1,299 zł including Fovea Blue glasses worth 497 zł.
